name: Passing Trick
descriptionText: Slipping past a foe gives you the chance to feint.
benefitText: Whenever you make a successful Acrobatics check to move through an opponent's space, you can spend a swift action to make a Bluff check against that opponent to feint in combat.
specialText: If you have the Underfoot feat and the opponent is larger than you, you gain a +2 bonus on the Bluff check this feat allows.
